trans-unit.source: Provides information about a type that components can access across application domain and process boundaries.
The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> structure provides information about an object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>結構提供實作之物件的相關資訊<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>介面。

trans-unit.source: To get type information about a remote object, components call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得遠端物件的類型資訊，請呼叫元件<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>。

trans-unit.source: Then, components call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetTypeData%2A> method to get a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>.
Indicates the rank (that is, the number of dimensions) of the remote array type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
To determine whether a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>描述陣列使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Represents the full name of the assembly that contains the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
Represents the name of the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes, qualified by the name of the assembly that contains the type.
The assembly-qualified name of a type includes the name of the assembly from which the type was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 組件限定類型名稱包含組件載入類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the format of an assembly-qualified name, see the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 組件限定名稱的格式的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the attributes of the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
The value of this field is <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Public> if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes the type of a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值是<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Public>如果這個<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>描述 COM 物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Represents the base type of the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
Represents the type of the elements in the remote array type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
To determine whether a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>描述陣列使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes, qualified by the namespace.
The fully qualified name of a type includes the namespace of the type, but not the assembly from which the type was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 型別的完整的名稱包含類型，但無法載入類型的組件的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes an array type.
The value of this field is `true` if the current <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array type; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值是`true`如果目前<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>描述陣列型別; 否則這個欄位的值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes a type that is passed by reference.
The value of this field is `true` if the current <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes a type that is passed by reference; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位的值是`true`如果目前<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>描述類型的參考方式傳遞; 否則這個欄位的值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Represents member data for the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
Represents the type of the remote type that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData" /> describes.
If the remote type is an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>, the value of this field is <xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果遠端的型別是<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>，此欄位的值是<xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
